name: Mutation Degeneration
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust any 2 of your alter-ego, your hero-specific ally, or Beast's Lab → remove Mutation Degeneration from the game.
Exhaust your identity and take 2 damage. Discard this obligation.

name: Dark Beast
text: Quickstrike. Forced Response: After Dark Beast attacks and damages a character, place 2 threat on the Dark Experimentation side scheme. If the Dark Experimentation side scheme is not in play, heal 2 damage from Dark Beast and the villain instead.

name: Dark Experimentation
text: Dark Beast is using chemistry and robotics to concoct vile and dangerous experiments. Enters play with 1 test counter. Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, if there are no test counters here, place 1 test counter here. Otherwise, seek an attachment from the encounter deck and reveal it. Then, remove 1 test counter from here and shuffle each other card discarded this way into the encounter deck.

name: Cybernetic Enhancements
text: Attach to a unique ([unique]) minion. If you cannot, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Dark Beast. Put him into play engaged with you with this card attached to him. Forced Response: After this card is attached to a minion, give attached minion a tough status card. Attached minion gets +2 hit points.

name: Horrifying Test Subject
text: Attach to a non-unique minion. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Attached minion gains armored 1 and the [[cyborg]] trait. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy would be defated, if no excess damage was dealt to it heal damage from this minion until it has 1 hit point remaining.

name: Power Dampening Serum
text: Attach to your identity. Treat the text boxes of your hero and any [[superpower]] upgrades you control as if they were blank (except for [[traits]]). You cannnot play [[superpower ]]cards. Alter-Ego Action: Spend a [mental] resource and exhaust your identity → discard this card.
